title: Abel Pineda

title: Backpocket
description: eCommerce webapp. The projects is developed with Django fo the backend, AWS3 for storing the images of the products and Stripe for the payments.

title: Bottleneck
description: Videogames reviews webtsite. In order to create a new post the user would have to registers. This CRUD webapp developed with Python3/Flask allows to create new users and new posts. The post can be read without being registered. The users, images and imformation of the posts are being stored in MongoDB.

title: Live-Band
description: Live-Band is webapp where to find your favourites band's concert.
